name: AF-Superhuman
title: ¬ Superhuman
author: Darcy Manoel
description:
Turns your avatar into an omnipotent nigh indestructible behemoth.
    ¬ Sets health to a ridiculous amount.
    ¬ Increases mining speed ludicrously.
    ¬ Allows incredible player reach across the map.
> All of these are able to be changed in mod settings.
